Package GameEnviroment

Class GameLogic

java.lang.Object
GameEnviroment.GameLogic
public class GameLogic extends Object
This class defines most of the games functionality

    • randomNumberInRange

      public static int randomNumberInRange(int min, int max)
      used to generate random numbers within a specified range
      Parameters:
      min - the lower bound for the random number generation
      max - the upper bound for the random number generation
      Returns:
      a random number with the upper and lower bound

    • setCurrentWeekModifier

      public static void setCurrentWeekModifier()
      the function used to set the currentWeekModifier the value of the modifier is based on whether the current week is a multiple of 3, if so the value of the cuurentWeekModifier is increased by 1

    • getCurrentWeekModifier

      public static int getCurrentWeekModifier()
      both sets and get the current week modifier
      Returns:

    • nameValidator

      public static boolean nameValidator(String name)
      used to make sure the players chosen team name conforms to the requirements The team name must be between 3-15 letter and include on special characters
      Parameters:
      name - taken from user input
      Returns:
      a boolean based on whether the inputed name is acceptable

    • updateMarket

      public static void updateMarket()
      updates the market attribute

    • isGameOver

      public static boolean isGameOver()
      returns a boolean indicating whether or not the game is over
      Returns:
      a boolean: true if the game is over, false if not

    • setup

      public static void setup(String name, int seasonLengthValue, int difficultyValue)
      initialises all of the variables needed to start the game -sets difficulty -sets seasonLength -creates a PlayerTeam and initialises the starting Athletes and team name, getting the player to choose their speaking positions -initialises the available matches for the current week
      Parameters:
      name - the ame of the player team
      seasonLengthValue - the length of the season
      difficultyValue - the games difficulty
